name: Battle of Hunters: Beast Zone
description:
Battle of Hunters: Beast Zone is a battle royale game with up to 20 players.
Solo matches, 2:2, 4:4, and other team matches are also available.
Characters in this game can use a variety of martial arts skills, and can also be tamed by hunting beasts inhabiting the field.
This is a new concept martial arts/pet battle royale game where you can tame several pets and battle them together.
